testimonials.title: Our Commitments.
testimonials.subtitle: The values that guide every innovation at Cocoti.

items.name: Maximum Security
items.quote: We use bank-grade security protocols and work with certified payment partners to protect every transaction.

items.name: Digital Solidarity
items.quote: Digitizing African traditions to strengthen human bonds, not replace them. Technology at the service of community.

items.name: Total Transparency
items.quote: Every flow, every contribution, every transaction is visible and traceable. Clarity is our greatest value.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions.
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know to get started with Cocoti.

items.question: What exactly is Cocoti?
items.answer: Cocoti is a digital platform that modernizes collective solidarity. It allows you to collect, manage, and distribute funds transparently within trusted groups.

items.question: Is the platform secure?
items.answer: Yes. We use advanced security protocols and integrate recognized payment solutions (Wave, Orange Money, Stripe). Your data is encrypted, and every transaction is tracked.

items.question: What are the usage fees?
items.answer: Registration is free. Minimal service fees may apply depending on the project type and the chosen plan. Everything is clearly displayed before each transaction.

items.question: How do I withdraw the collected funds?
items.answer: You can request a withdrawal to your Mobile Money account or via bank transfer once your project conditions are met. Funds are transferred directly to the configured payment method.

items.question: Is it suitable for people living abroad?
items.answer: Yes, this is one of our key strengths. Cocoti connects the diaspora with their projects or loved ones. It is possible to contribute by credit card from abroad for projects managed locally.

items.question: What happens if a member does not fulfill their commitment?
items.answer: The platform automates reminders and provides rigorous tracking. Managers have tools to adjust management, and the transparency of the history encourages the fulfillment of collective commitments.

items.question: Is Cocoti a bank?
items.answer: No, Cocoti is not a bank. We are a technical facilitator (management platform) that relies on licensed financial partners to secure fund flows.

create.title: Create a Money Pool
create.formSubtitle: Fill in the information below to create your money pool
create.name: Money Pool Name *
create.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your project in detail (minimum 300 characters)...
create.publicSettingsNotEditable: Not editable for public money pools
create.allowAnonymousDescription: If disabled, all contributors will need to display their name
create.illustrationsFormat: Images (JPG, PNG, WEBP - max 5MB) or Videos (MP4, WEBM - max 50MB)
create.step2Subtitle: To create your money pool, we need to verify your identity
create.otpDescription: Enter the 6-digit code received by SMS
create.alreadyAuthenticated: You are already logged in. Your identity is verified.
create.activationQuestion: Would you like to publish it now?
create.publishNowDescription: Visible and can receive contributions immediately
create.publishWarningMessage: For ethical and transparency reasons, after publication, you will no longer be able to modify the money pool information (name, description, target amount, dates, etc.). This measure ensures contributor trust in your project. Only certain parameters can be adjusted. Are you sure you want to publish now?
create.successActive: Your money pool has been created and is now active. It is visible and can receive contributions.
create.successDraft: Your money pool has been created as a draft. You can activate it later from your dashboard.
create.privateMessage: Your money pool is private. Only people with the link can access and contribute.
